javascript.code: /* The density of a network is a measure of how many edges exist proportional to how many edges would exist in a complete network (where all possible edges). https://networkx.org/documentation/networkx-1.9/reference/generated/networkx.classes.function.density.html */ function density (numberOfNodes, numberOfEdges, isDirected = false) { const multi = isDirected ? 1 : 2 return (multi * numberOfEdges) / (numberOfNodes * (numberOfNodes - 1)) } console.log(density(10, 2))
